name: PoxelCat
description:
Join Discord server for support=====>

PoxelCat is a small funny clicker game inspired by PopCat.

The player can collect points and coins by simply clicking the cat. 

Up to this version, the player can : 

  • Players can earn coins and score by clicking 
  • Players can see the top-ranking players in the leaderboard
  • Players can change their names again from the new settings tab

This update also contains  A NEW ROOM AND SHOP  

  • Players have a room where they can feed their cat and get XP points.
  • Players can access a shop to buy items (Only food items are there now)
